page.title: 10GAMES AND POEMS
page.content: These are some poems that we sing when we are skipping or playing french skipping. French skipping is a game that you play with a piece of elastic which you jump over. Skipping:-Doctor Doctor. Doctor,Doctor how's your wife, Very well thank you she's alright, She can't eat liquorice, She can't eat biscuits, OUT spells out, OVER spells over, UNDER spells under, IN spells in, You can't get out till you turn round, touch the ground, count to sixteen with your eyes shut. French Skipping:_Big Ben Big Ben strikes 10 inside,outside scales Spangle,jingle,jangle,scales inside sangle out.
